import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { productApi } from '../services/api'; function HomePage() { const [featuredProducts, setFeaturedProducts] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [error, setError] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { const fetchFeaturedProducts = async () => { try { const response = await productApi.getProducts({ limit: 6, sort: 'newest' }); setFeaturedProducts(response.data.products); setLoading(false); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching featured products:', error); setError('Failed to load featured products'); setLoading(false); } }; fetchFeaturedProducts(); }, []); return (

); } export default HomePage;
